testcase.name: Transfer funds from USD to EUR account
testcase.system-out: Given a bank account with account number "A-12345" and balance "$1000" in USD.passed And a bank account with account number "B-67890" and balance "€800" in EUR..passed When I transfer $300 from account "A-12345" to account "B-67890" in EUR.....passed Then the account balance for account "A-12345" should be "$600".............passed And the account balance for account "B-67890" should be "€1000".............passed

testcase.name: Money Transfer with enough balance
testcase.system-out: Given User with account number 123456 is registered.........................passed When User with account number 123456 transfers $300.........................passed And User with account number 123456 transfers $200..........................passed Then User with account number 123456 should have $0 in balance..............passed

testcase.name: Money transfer with insufficient funds
testcase.system-out: Given User with account number 4210 is registered...........................passed And User with account number 4210 deposits $1000.0..........................passed When User with account number 4210 transfers $1100.0........................passed Then User with account number 4210 should have $1000.0 in balance...........passed And User should see Insufficient funds message..............................passed
